data.oai_dc:dc: Figure S1: Number of WoS-studies in relation to year of publication

The number of publications per year from a search in Science Citation Core Collection, referring to “eco-evolutionary dynamics”, “eco-evolutionary dynamics and sexual selection” and “eco-evolutionary dynamics and sexual conflict”. The three different categories are shown in different shadings. The identity of all the different publications (total of 566 from 1991-2017) are shown in Table S1.
demography|eco-evolutionary feedback|evolutionary rescue|extinction|population dynamics|population fitness|rapid evolution|sexual conflict
